code: import{ENQUIRY_CREATE_REQUEST,ENQUIRY_CREATE_FAIL,ENQUIRY_CREATE_SUCCESS,ENQUIRY_LIST_REQUEST,ENQUIRY_LIST_SUCCESS,ENQUIRY_LIST_FAIL,ENQUIRY_DETAILS_FAIL,ENQUIRY_DETAILS_REQUEST,ENQUIRY_DETAILS_SUCCESS}from"../constants/enquiryConstants";export var enquirylistReducer=function enquirylistReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{loading:true};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ENQUIRY_LIST_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case ENQUIRY_LIST_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,listenquiry:action.payload};case ENQUIRY_LIST_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export var addEnquiryReducer=function addEnquiryReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ENQUIRY_CREATE_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case ENQUIRY_CREATE_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,enquiryAdd:action.payload};case ENQUIRY_CREATE_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export var enquiryDetailsReducer=function enquiryDetailsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{enquiry:{},loading:true};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ENQUIRY_DETAILS_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case ENQUIRY_DETAILS_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,enquiry:action.payload};case ENQUIRY_DETAILS_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};
